member.name: T:RT.Lingo.LingoTypeDescriptionProvider`1
member.summary: Provides a type descriptor which supports translation of various string values using the Lingo conventions (see remarks).
member.typeparam: The type of the translation class.
member.remarks: Every property requiring translatable name/description/category should have a corresponding method in the same class. This method should be static, named the same as the property with a "Tr" suffix, take a translation instance and return a .

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.LingoTypeDescriptionProvider`1.#ctor(System.Func{`0})
member.summary: Constructs a type description provider using the specified translation getter.
member.param: A function that returns the currently active translation.

member.name: T:RT.Lingo.LingoEnumConverter`2
member.summary: Provides a base implementation for enum converters intended to enable enum translation. See remarks.
member.typeparam: Type of the enum being translated.
Type of a translation class which has fields named the same as enum values.
member.remarks: Suggested use: define a separate Lingo string class for the enum. Inside this class, declare a nested class deriving from this base class. Specify a TypeConverter on the enum in question using the said nested class.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.LingoEnumConverter`2.#ctor(System.Func{`1})
member.param: A method which returns the currently active translation for this enum.

member.summary: Specifies information about a group of translatable strings. Use this on a field in an enum type which enumerates the available groups of strings.

member.param: Specifies a short name for the group, to be used in the listbox in the translation window.

member.summary: Specifies a short name for the group, to be used in the listbox in the translation window.

member.name: P:RT.Lingo.LingoGroupAttribute.Description
member.summary: Specifies a long description for the group, to be displayed above the list of string codes while the group is selected.

member.name: T:RT.Lingo.LingoAutoGeneratedAttribute
member.summary: Code that automatically generates Lingo-compatible class declarations can add this attribute to indicate fields of string classes that were generated automatically. Lingo.TranslationFileGenerator.TranslateControl generates this, for example.

member.name: T:RT.Lingo.TranslatableException`1
member.summary: Provides a means for an application to throw exceptions containing translatable messages without the need to pass a -derived object to all methods that could throw exceptions.
member.typeparam: The type containing the translatable strings.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TranslatableException`1.#ctor(System.Func{`0,System.String})
member.param: A function which returns the exception message given a object. This would usually be of the form "tr => tr.FieldName" or "tr => tr.FieldName.Fmt(parameters)".

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TranslatableException`1.#ctor(System.Func{`0,System.String},System.Exception)
member.param: A function which returns the exception message given a object. This would usually be of the form "tr => tr.FieldName" or "tr => tr.FieldName.Fmt(parameters)".
Inner exception.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TranslatableException`1.GetMessage(`0)
member.param: Translation object containing the translations for all messages.

member.name: T:RT.Lingo.TranslationBase
member.summary: Abstract base class to represent translations of a piece of software.

member.name: F:RT.Lingo.TrString.Translation
member.summary: Contains the current translation of this string, or for the original language, the current original text.

member.name: F:RT.Lingo.TrString.Old
member.summary: Contains the original text this string was last translated from, or for the original language, null.

member.summary: Constructs a new translatable string given the specified translation.

member.summary: Implicit cast from string to TrString.

member.summary: Implicit cast from TrString to string.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TrString.Color(System.Nullable{System.ConsoleColor},System.Nullable{System.ConsoleColor})
member.summary: Returns the translation in the specified console color.
member.param: The foreground color in which to color the translation, or null to use the console’s default foreground color.
The background color in which to color the translation, or null to use the console’s default background color.

member.name: T:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum
member.summary: Represents a translatable string into which numbers are interpolated, requiring grammatical morphology according to a language's .

member.name: F:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.IsNumber
member.summary: Specifies which of the interpolated objects are integers.

member.name: F:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.Translations
member.summary: Contains the current translation of this string, or for the original language, the current original text.

member.name: F:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.Old
member.summary: Contains the original text this string was last translated from. Null for the original language.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.#ctor(System.String[],System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Constructs a new translatable string with the specified translations.
member.param: Specifies the translations for this string. The number of elements is expected to be equal to the number of strings as defined by your native language's NumberSystem, multiplied by the number of elements in that are true.
Specifies which of the interpolated variables are integers.

example.para: The following example code demonstrates how to instantiate a string that interpolates both a string (file name) and an integer (number of bytes) correctly.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Constructs a new translatable string with one interpolated integer and no other interpolated arguments, and the specified translations.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.Fmt(RT.Lingo.TranslationBase,System.Object[])
member.summary: Selects the correct string and interpolates the specified arguments.
member.param: Current translation. Its language’s number system will be used to interpolate the translation.
Arguments to be interpolated into the translation.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.Fmt(RT.Lingo.Language,System.Object[])
member.summary: Selects the correct string and interpolates the specified arguments.
member.param: Current translation’s language. Its number system will be used to interpolate the translation.
Arguments to be interpolated into the translation.

member.name: M:RT.Lingo.TrStringNum.Fmt(RT.Lingo.NumberSystem,System.Object[])
member.summary: Selects the correct string and interpolates the specified arguments.
member.param: Number system to use to interpolate the translation.
Arguments to be interpolated into the translation.
